attributes.action: Encourage Return to Nursing. For Nurses with lapsed registrations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many nurses who have lapsed registrations would like to return to nursing practice but find training places limited. Further Nurses who have lapsed registrations on one part of the register should be encouraged to return to other areas where the is greater need. An example is RNMH nurses retraining as RGN's
